DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial supported by the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trial supported by the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PRL0602 Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the eligibility criteria for the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL) clinical trial PRL0602.

PermissibleValues.value: Has the subject had diagnostic bitewing radiographs within the past 7 months?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Has the subject had diagnostic bitewing radiographs within the past 7 months?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Has the subject had diagnostic bitewing radiographs within the past 7 months?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Has the subject had diagnostic bitewing radiographs within the past 7 months?

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject have solely adult dentition?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject have solely adult dentition?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject have solely adult dentition?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject have solely adult dentition?

PermissibleValues.value: Are one or more permanent posterior teeth present (in different quadrants, with third molars excluded) with the clinical diagnosis of new Class I caries extending into dentin with or without radiographic confirmation?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Are one or more permanent posterior teeth present (in different quadrants, with third molars excluded) with the clinical diagnosis of new Class I caries extending into dentin with or without radiographic confirmation

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Are one or more permanent posterior teeth present (in different quadrants, with third molars excluded) with the clinical diagnosis of new Class I caries extending into dentin with or without radiographic confirmation
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Are one or more permanent posterior teeth present (in different quadrants, with third molars excluded) with the clinical diagnosis of new Class I caries extending into dentin with or without radiographic confirmation? If there is more than one occlusal lesion in a quadrant that meets the inclusion criteria the patient is not eligible for inclusion in the study. Only one tooth per quadrant can be treated at a time.

PermissibleValues.value: Is the radiographic depth of the lesion less than or equal to one-half the Dento-Enamel Junction (DEJ) to pulp distance?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the radiographic depth of the lesion less than or equal to one-half the Dento-Enamel Junction (DEJ) to pulp distance?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the radiographic depth of the lesion less than or equal to one-half the Dento-Enamel Junction (DEJ) to pulp distance?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the radiographic depth of the lesion less than or equal to one-half the Dento-Enamel Junction (DEJ) to pulp distance?

PermissibleValues.value: Is the protocol tooth in occlusion with a natural tooth?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the protocol tooth in occlusion with a natural tooth?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the protocol tooth in occlusion with a natural tooth?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the protocol tooth in occlusion with a natural tooth?

PermissibleValues.value: Would a resin-based composite restoration be the standard of care for the lesion?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Would a resin-based composite restoration be the standard of care for the lesion?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Would a resin-based composite restoration be the standard of care for the lesion?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Would a resin-based composite restoration be the standard of care for the lesion?

PermissibleValues.value: Is the tooth free of evidence of a pulpitis (no report of lingering pain associated with any stimulus)?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the tooth free of evidence of a pulpitis (no report of lingering pain associated with any stimulus)?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the tooth free of evidence of a pulpitis (no report of lingering pain associated with any stimulus)?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the tooth free of evidence of a pulpitis (no report of lingering pain associated with any stimulus)?

PermissibleValues.value: Is the subject available for contact for at least 3 months post-treatment?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the subject available for contact for at least 3 months post-treatment?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the subject available for contact for at least 3 months post-treatment?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the subject available for contact for at least 3 months post-treatment?

PermissibleValues.value: Has the subject signed and dated the IRB-approved informed consent form or assent form for individuals under 18 years old?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Has the subject signed and dated the IRB-approved informed consent form or assent form for individuals under 18 years old?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Has the subject signed and dated the IRB-approved informed consent form or assent form for individuals under 18 years old?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Has the subject signed and dated the IRB-approved informed consent form or assent form for individuals under 18 years old?
